layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen relative overflow-hidden shadow-2xl bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (Heart, Music, Calendar, Gift, Star, ArrowRight)

Button.base: rounded-full font-['Fredoka'] font-semibold shadow-lg transition-all active:scale-95

Card.base: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-md border-2 border-[#FFD1DC] p-4 relative overflow-visible
Card.polaroid: bg-white p-3 pb-10 shadow-xl rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform duration-300 border border-gray-100

Input.base: rounded-xl border-2 border-[#FFD1DC] focus:border-[#FF69B4] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FF69B4]/20 bg-white/80 text-center font-['Gaegu'] text-2xl tracking-widest

Landing.content: Hi Lixie... I made something for you.

Password.logic: Password: '22122024'. On error: Mascot shakes head. On success: Confetti explosion.

LoveCheck.interaction: NoButton moves away on hover. YesButton triggers 'I knew it!' popup.

Birthday.prompt: Generate a sweet, romantic birthday wish for Lixie (turning 22) from Ryzen. Mention her cute habits.

ThankYou.prompt: Generate a touching thank you note for being the best girlfriend.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: `npm install framer-motion react-confetti typewriter-effect lucide-react`
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Add the custom colors and fonts to `tailwind.config.js`.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Import the Google Fonts in `index.css`. Set `body` font to 'Gaegu'.
5. MUSIC: Since local MP3s are requested but not provided, create a MOCK player structure that accepts URLs. Use placeholder audio or free assets if possible.
6. AI TEXT: Use the provided prompts to generate static text for now, or simulate the AI call if backend is ready.
7. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure all touch targets are 44px+. Test on 375px width.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all buttons and inputs (e.g., `login-submit`, `love-yes-btn`).
universal_guidelines: Do not use default shadcn styles. Override radius to `rounded-3xl`.
Use 'Gaegu' font for all body text to maintain the handwritten feel.
Ensure the 'No' button in the Love Game is impossible to click (moves fast).
Use the provided image URLs for stickers and backgrounds.
